question: The core of Jaina doctrine is expressed in which of the following principles?AnekantavadaSyadavadaNayavadaPancha MahavrataSelect the correct option from the codes given below:
Which of the following are correct regarding Jatakas?
optionA: They are the stories of animals
optionB: They are the stories of Buddha’s family
optionC: They are the stories of previous births of the Buddha
correctAns: They are the stories of previous births of the Buddha
